title: BMCR09
description: Thermocouple disconneced form temperature card or at connector.
reasons_remedies: The temperature sensor is not connected to the top heating plate.
Connect temperature sensor to top heating plate.
Check if the thermocouple cable is open or damaged. Check the Thermocouple connector and cable for continuty. Replace cable if continuity not found.

text_for_embedding:
Error Code BMCR09
Error Code 09
Category: BMCR
Title: BMCR09
Alarm Message: Forming Top Thermocouple Open
Description: Thermocouple disconneced form temperature card or at connector.
Reason & Remedy:
1. The temperature sensor is not connected to the top heating plate.
2. Connect temperature sensor to top heating plate.
3. Check if the thermocouple cable is open or damaged. Check the Thermocouple connector and cable for continuty. Replace cable if continuity not found.
4. The temperature sensor failed.
5. Replace the temperature sensor.
Visual References:
- Thermocouple Connector Thermocouple Connector Opened Thermocouple Connector Closed
- Thermocouple Connector Thermocouple Connector Opened Thermocouple Connector Closed
- Thermocouple Connector Thermocouple Connector Opened Thermocouple Connector Closed
